snippet: Chancellor Angela Merkel can ill afford to lose another president as she deals with multiple crises.
abstract: Personal loan scandal engulfing German president Christian Wulff presents conundrum for Chancellor Angela Merkel, who appointed him; analysts say Merkel can ill afford to lose another president as she grapples with multiple crises.
lead_paragraph: Chancellor Angela Merkel can ill afford to lose another president as she deals with multiple crises.

headline.main: President's Loan Scandal Adds Pressure on Merkel
headline.print_headline: Heat Rises For Merkel As Criticism Of Ally Grows
